text: The Community Garden at the Waterside  brings together the varied  loves and interests of its residents.  A biodiverse oasis in a little corner on the estate where we reminisce our growing up years among family tending to plants, building trellises with care, mulching and fertilising, pruning and harvesting,  sharing our love for nature and growing. I love the composting corner which quietly works on its task, while overlooking the garden. This is a beautiful work in progress!
I love being part of this community garden. You get to learn so much about nature. Its truly a wonderful experience. Even a simple act of watering the plants can be meditative.
Love this space! Slowly taking shape! Also love how the community is interacting to help one another to bring this together
Created with so much of love and care by our gardening team.👏🏼👏🏼🌹
I love the concept even though i am not a part of the gardening group
